summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1557, for the improvement of Hanford Street from Fourteenth Avenue South to Beacon Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon under Ordinance No. 16777 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
